about.title: About me
about.experience: I am a Senior Frontend Developer with over {yearsDiff} years of commercial experience. I specialize in Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, as well as Node.js and MySQL.

work.description: On a daily basis, I work at <instreamly>inStreamly</instreamly>, where I implement innovative solutions together with the product and business teams. One of the key areas of my work is <aiImplementation>implementing AI solutions</aiImplementation> and <teamSupport>supporting team development</teamSupport>.

brands.description: I have collaborated with brands such as <samsung>Samsung</samsung> and <pkobp>PKO Bank Polski</pkobp> as a freelancer. In my spare time, I run my own business <mwebs>mwebs</mwebs>, where I create websites and applications for dozens of clients.

values.description: In my work, I take <dri>full responsibility (DRI)</dri> for the tasks entrusted to me, treating each project as if it were my own. I value <feedback>honest and constructive feedback (Feedback)</feedback> and believe that <nvc>kindness and mutual respect (NVC)</nvc> are key to team success.

cta.title: Want to work with me?
cta.description: Write to me on LinkedIn and we'll be in touch!
